content.text: Hi! I'm trying to figure out how to cope with my breakup. It's been really hard on me.
Hey, I'm so sorry to hear that. Breakups are really hard. I'm going through one myself right now.
Thanks for listening. I'm glad to hear I'm not alone.
Yeah, it's definitely not easy. But we'll get through it.
I hope so. I'm trying to stay positive, but it's hard.
I know what you mean. But just remember, there are so many people who love you. And you'll find someone else who's better for you.
Thanks for the encouragement. I really appreciate it.
Anytime. We're all in this together.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play badminton, read sci-fi books, and listen to rap music.
Oh cool! I love to read sci-fi books too. I also like to play video games.
Me too! I love playing video games. What's your favorite video game?
I really like playing The Sims. It's so much fun to create your own little world.
I've never played The Sims, but it sounds really fun. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really great game.
Thanks for the recommendation. I'll definitely check it out.
No problem! I'm always happy to give recommendations.
You seem really cool. We should hang out sometime.
I'd love to!
Great! I'll text you my number.
Sounds good
